title: The Fiend
content:
s.

Create an illusion that compels nearby creatures to investigate.

Project a puff of noxious gas.

Inflicts True Strike (2)Gain Advantage on your next Attack Roll.

18m Concentration

Armour of Agathys

Inflicts Armour of Agathys (1)Gain 5 temporary hit points and deal 5 Cold damage to any creature that hits you with a melee attack.

Prevents targets from using reactions.

One Save: Targets still take half damage but are able to use reactions.

Each flammable target is hit with 3~18 Fire dama
